org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.samediff

Class SameDiffGraphVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph.vertex.BaseGraphVertex
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.samediff.SameDiffGraphVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Trainable, GraphVertex

    public class SameDiffGraphVertex
extends BaseGraphVertex
    Implementation of a SameDiff graph vertex. Note that users should not be extending this directly - instead, use SameDiffVertex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
